Darkfate/7 batprobes::


Darkfate landed in robot mode, several feet of Pernabot. 6 of the 7 
bat probes spread in several diferent directions and they lost in the 
distance. One landed in Darkfate's arm.

"So, does Zardus want to make a deal with me?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Darkfate/Chamaleon/
> 
> Darkfate smiled, "Yesss" thought the bo while he saw the place and 
> using his com link he said "I'm on the way..."
> 
> He turned off his comm link.
> 
> Chameleon appeared and told him somethings; darkfate smiled pleased 
> and said "Send this thing to Drillbit, close the Black Fortress and 
> attend our guest" he said while he gave something a chameleon "and 
> call Thyphon and Elecktra, I could need them"
> 
> The male leave the base following by his bat probes.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Perndbot::
> > 
> > "Allright," Perndabot replies, looking around and thinking over 
> where 
> > to land. There was a mountain nearby where he could land and keep 
> > track of everything going on, but that would make him a pretty 
easy 
> > target in case Darkfate didn't want to negotiate a treaty.
> > 
> > He spots a clearing, swooping down and landing. Perfect. He could 
> see 
> > for a good distance, enough to prepare for an attack, and there 
was 
> > practically no interference to his scanners.
> > 
> > "I'm all settled in," he replies to Darkfate, "Ready when you 
are."
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > ::Darkfate::
> > > 
> > > The male bot though a second before answer "You can come in our 
> > > territory, where do you want speak? choose the place, but it 
> should 
> > > be in our territory or around..."
> > > 
> > > While he said that words, he send a secret menssage to 
> > Blacknigh
